recommendations: Eklabya Nayak “I studied with Gyan in Kendriya Vidyalaya No.-3, Bhubaneswar for a period of 9 years. I found him loaded with honesty, self-respect, kindness and truthfulness. He was the most cherished leader of the class, house and one of the top commanders in Scouts & Guides at school. Juniors, Seniors, teachers and even Principal saw him as a good student in terms of academics, cultural events and sports with an intense capability of leading any team he is a part of. He showed his calmness in class and fierceness in sports like Taekwondo and Kabaddi bagging medals for the school. I wish you all the best for future Gyan!”

Prachi Gaikwad “I have had the privilege of working closely with Gyan Prakash for one year in the capacity of data analyst.And I am consistently impressed with his exceptional analytical skills , attention to details and commitment to delivering actionable insights.In addition to his technical prowess , Gyan is a proactive and collaborative team member.He consistently seeks opportunities to contribute to team discussions,share insights and and collaborate on cross-functional projects.Gyan is also adept at identifying and addressing potential data quality issues ensuring the accuracy and reliability of our analytical outputs.”
